sense.def:
To cover something
pomeni nekaj dati na nekaj drugega, da bi prvo stvar zavarovali ali skrili.

seg.quote: She covered her face with her hands.

sense.def:
Če nekaj
covers something else
, oblikuje plast nad prvo stvarjo.

seg.quote: Her hand was covered with blood.

sense.def:
To cover a particular distance
pomeni prepotovati določeno razdaljo.

seg.quote: I covered approximately twenty miles a day.

sense.def:
Če zavarovalna polica
covers a person or thing
, jamči, da bo denar izplačan za tisto osebo ali stvar.

seg.quote: This policy gives unlimited cover for hospital charges.

sense.def:
Če neki zakon
covers a particular set of people, things, or situations
, se nanaša na določeno skupino ljudi, stvari ali okoliščin.

To cover a particular topic
pomeni razpravljati o neki témi med učno uro, tečajem ali v knjigi.

seg.quote: We've covered a wide range of subjects today.

sense.def:
Če dopisniki, časopisi ali televizijske družbe
cover an event
, poročajo o nekem dogodku.

Če neki znesek
covers something
, je dovolj velik za plačilo nečesa.

seg.quote: I'll give you a cheque to cover the cost of your journey.

sense.def:
A cover
je nekaj, kar damo čez neki predmet, navadno zato, da ga zavarujemo.

Če je spoštljivo ali vsakdanje vedênje
a cover for secret or illegal activities
, je njegov namen prikriti tajne ali nedovoljene dejavnosti.

Bed covers
so rjuha, odeje in pregrinjalo, ki jih imamo na postelji, ko spimo.

The cover of a book or a magazine
je zunanja stran knjige ali revije.

Cover
so drevesa, skale ali kaj drugega, kamor se zatečemo pred vremenskimi nevšečnostmi ali skrijemo pred kom.

seg.quote: They crossed to the other side of the stream in search of cover.

sense.def:
To take cover
pomeni zateči se pred vremenskimi nevšečnostmi ali strelskim ognjem.

Če nekaj storimo
under cover of a particular condition
, nam to omogoči, da tisto storimo, ne da bi nas kdo opazil.

seg.quote: The attack usually takes place under cover of darkness.

sense.def:
To cover something up
pomeni nekaj dati na nekaj drugega, da bi tisto zavarovali ali skrili.

To cover up for something
, pomeni, da ljudem nekaj skrijemo, če nočemo, da bi za tisto vedeli.

seg.quote: She tried to cover up for Willie.
